name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Service Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong **communication skills** and **analytical skills** to effectively troubleshoot and provide technical support for inspection machinery, including **checkweighers**, **x-ray**, and **metal detection** systems in the **food**, **beverage**, and **pharmaceutical** industries. My robust software experience allows me to integrate technical solutions that enhance operational efficiency and uphold customer focus. 

In addition, I bring expertise in **full-stack development**, utilizing technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to build high-performance solutions. My proficiency in frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** complements my deep knowledge of cloud platforms, mainly **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise-level applications that incorporate advanced features, including **AI/ML** capabilities for analytics and real-time processing. Furthermore, my strong foundation in **microservices architecture**, **event-driven systems**, and **CI/CD automation** ensures the delivery of secure and compliant applications.
